00030 using namespace uvm;

00032 class uvm_ml_barrier_pool;
00033 
00034 class uvm_ml_barrier : public uvm_barrier {
00035 
00036   friend class uvm_ml_barrier_pool;
00037   friend class uvm_pool<uvm_ml_barrier>;
00038 
00039 public:
00040 
00041   static void initialize(bp_api_struct *bp_provided_api);
00042 
00043   virtual void wait(); 
00044   virtual void wait_without_bp_notification();
00045 
00046   virtual void raise_barrier(int count = 1);
00047   virtual void raise_barrier_without_bp_notification(int count = 1);
00048 
00049   virtual void drop_barrier(int count = 1);
00050   virtual void drop_barrier_without_bp_notification(int count = 1);
00051 
00052   // Note:  sc_barrier() do not have hierarchy, so get_full_name() 
00053   //        does not make sense here - comment out for now...
00054   //virtual const std::string &get_full_name() const;
00055 
00056   static void notify_barrier_by_name(const char *                   scope_name,
00057                                      const char *                   barrier_name,
00058                                      uvm_ml_barrier_notify_action   action,
00059                                      int                            count,
00060                                      uvm_ml_time_unit               time_unit,
00061                                      double                         time_value);
00062 
00063  
00064   void notify_ml_barrier(uvm_ml_barrier_notify_action     action,
00065                          int                              val = 0);
00066 
00067 protected:
00068   uvm_ml_barrier(const std::string &name="");
00069   void set_pool(uvm_ml_barrier_pool * pool);
00070 
00071 private:
00072 
00073   uvm_ml_barrier_pool * _pool;
00074 
00075   static bp_api_struct * _bp_provided_api;
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079 class uvm_ml_barrier_pool : public uvm_barrier_pool {
00080 
00081 public:
00082 
00083   class uvm_object_creator_uvm_pool : public uvm_object_creator
00084   {
00085   public:
00086       uvm_object* create(const string& name)
00087       {
00088           uvm_object* _uvmsc_obj = new uvm_ml_barrier_pool(name);
00089           _uvmsc_obj->set_name(name);
00090           return _uvmsc_obj;
00091       }
00092   };
00093 
00094   uvm_ml_barrier_pool(const string &name) :
00095         uvm_barrier_pool(name)
00096   {
00097   }
00098 
00099   virtual string get_type_name() const { return "uvm_ml_barrier_pool"; }
00100 
00101 public:
00102   static void initialize();
00103 
00104   virtual uvm_barrier* get (const string& name);
00105   virtual bool remove (const string &name);
00106   virtual bool remove_without_bp_notification (const string &name);
00107 
00108 };
